Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a strategic action plan created by the metropolitan transportation authority to develop which improves bicycle and pedestrian access at its bridges and passenger stations
Summary: Relates to a strategic action plan created by the metropolitan transportation authority which improves bicycle and pedestrian access at its bridges and passenger stations; requires findings be submitted by June 1, 2022 and every 5 years thereafter.
LawCode: Amd §1, Chap of 2021; amd §§1269-b, 1266-e, 1266-d & 1204-e, Pub Auth L (as proposed in S.4943-B & A.6235-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority to develop a strategic action plan to improve bicycle and pedestrian access at its bridges and passenger stations; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2021 amending the public authorities law relating to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority to develop a strategic action plan to improve bicycle and pedestrian access at its bridges and passenger stations, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 4943-B and A. 6235-B, in relation to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority to develop a strategic action plan to improve bicycle and pedestrian access at its bridges and passenger stations
